channel.title: 617 run problem
channel.description:
when i try to run the source i get it saying:
error: missing 'server' JUM at 'c:\Program Files\Java|jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll' Please install or use JRE or JDK that contain these missing components. Press any key to continue . . .
what do i do......i have jdk1.7.0_01 and i changed all the client and run thing that i can find to that but i don't know what to do :confused: Can anyone help??

item.title: 617 run problem
item.dc:creator: @andy_hd andy hd
item.description:
@andy_hd wrote:

when i try to run the source i get it saying:

error: missing ‘server’ JUM at ‘c:\Program Files\Java|jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll’
Please install or use JRE or JDK that contain these missing components.
Press any key to continue . . .

what do i do…i have jdk1.7.0_01 and i changed all the client and run thing that i can find to that but i don’t know what to do Can anyone help??
